channel.title: Different source with the Mopar client
channel.description:
I know this is old and fairly simple but i am a noob and bored. i just downloaded this delta source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514711.0.html
and i am wondering if it's possible to make the mopar client load it and if so how.
Thanks for your time.

item.title: Different source with the Mopar client
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

Delta? Allstar? Wtf…I thought this was 2k13, but guess I must be wrong…

ot: You have to check if the login decoder is compatible, if not you have to edit it…If you leave your login method for Client and your LoginDecoder (might not be the name) class I’ll do it for you…

Read full topic
item.source: Different source with the Mopar client

item.title: Different source with the Mopar client
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

you runserver and then log in on the ip of “0.0.0.0” OR “127.0.0.1”

simple as that

make sure your client is for delata

btw as a starter i suggest allstar (allstar is also much cooler)

Read full topic
